title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5300.11 - Ejectment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5300.11 - Ejectment

State Regulations
(a) Any person who
is observed by an employee of the Capital District Transportation Authority to
be violating any of these rules may be ejected from the facility or conveyance
as directed by a manager, superintendent, or transit supervisor; or by any
other employee of the Capital District Transportation Authority when duly
authorized by a manager, superintendent, or transit
supervisor. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5300.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
